objectives: Students will discuss education and learning using Informal/Conversational register language
Students will engage with Drama themed scenarios related to education and learning
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of informal level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining education and learning content with Drama narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore education and learning through a Drama lens using Informal/Conversational language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a dramatic conflict or emotional crisis involving education and learning

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice informal register vocabulary related to education and learning in a drama context
Students engage in drama themed role-play about education and learning using informal register
Students create original drama themed content about education and learning in informal register

discussion_questions: How would you describe education and learning in a Drama scenario?
What conflict or tension might be involved in education and learning?
Can you create a Drama story about education and learning?
How does education and learning change when viewed through a Drama perspective?
What informal register expressions would you use to discuss this drama scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Drama situation involving education and learning
roles: Character A: Using informal register in drama context
Character B: Responding in informal register within drama theme

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Informal/Conversational throughout: Friendly, relaxed everyday speech
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Drama theme: Intense emotions, conflicts, life challenges

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Informal/Conversational register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Drama themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of informal register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
